Note: Lines 3 and 5 repeat in each stanza.
_description: Old Hogyn and his Girl Friend, a ribald lyric — six 6-line stanzas, with refrain ‘Hum ha trill go bell’ in lines 4 and 6 of each stanza

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Hogyn cam to bowers doreHogyn cam to bowers
                    dore…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Or ellis your breth ys wonder strongHum ha trill go
                    bellExplicit
